title: JSON schema for the JavaScript configuration file

files.description: If no 'files' or 'include' property is present in a tsconfig.json, the compiler defaults to including all files in the containing directory and subdirectories except those specified by 'exclude'. When a 'files' property is specified, only those files and those specified by 'include' are included.

exclude.description: Specifies a list of files to be excluded from compilation. The 'exclude' property only affects the files included via the 'include' property and not the 'files' property. Glob patterns require TypeScript version 2.0 or later.

include.description: Specifies a list of glob patterns that match files to be included in compilation. If no 'files' or 'include' property is present in a tsconfig.json, the compiler defaults to including all files in the containing directory and subdirectories except those specified by 'exclude'. Requires TypeScript version 2.0 or later.

extends.description: Path to base configuration file to inherit from. Requires TypeScript version 2.1 or later.

compilerOptions.description: Instructs the JavaScript language service how to validate and down level compile .js files.

charset.description: The character set of the input files.

diagnostics.description: When down-level compiling, show diagnostic information.

emitBOM.description: When down-level compiling, emit a UTF-8 Byte Order Mark (BOM) in the beginning of output files.

inlineSourceMap.description: When down-level compiling, emit a single file with source maps instead of having a separate file.

inlineSources.description: When down-level compiling, emit the source alongside the sourcemaps within a single file; requires --inlineSourceMap to be set.

jsx.description: When down-level compiling, specify JSX code generation: 'preserve', 'react', or 'react-native'.

reactNamespace.description: When down-level compiling, specifies the object invoked for createElement and __spread when targeting 'react' JSX emit.

listFiles.description: When down-level compiling, print names of files part of the compilation.

mapRoot.description: When down-level compiling, specifies the location where debugger should locate map files instead of generated locations.

module.description: When down-level compiling, specify module code generation: 'CommonJS', 'Amd', 'System', 'UMD', 'es6', or 'es2015'.

newLine.description: When down-level compiling, specifies the end of line sequence to be used when emitting files: 'CRLF' (dos) or 'LF' (unix).

noEmit.description: When down-level compiling, do not emit output.

noEmitHelpers.description: When down-level compiling, do not generate custom helper functions like __extends in compiled output.

noEmitOnError.description: When down-level compiling, do not emit outputs if any type checking errors were reported.

noLib.description: Do not include the default library file (lib.d.ts).

noResolve.description: When down-level compiling, do not add triple-slash references or module import targets to the list of compiled files.

skipDefaultLibCheck.description: Do not check for the default library (lib.d.ts).

skipLibCheck.description: Do not check declaration files. Requires TypeScript version 2.0 or later.

outFile.description: When down-level compiling, concatenate and emit output to single file.

outDir.description: When down-level compiling, redirect output structure to the directory.

pretty.description: When down-level compiling, stylize errors and messages using color and context (experimental).

removeComments.description: When down-level compiling, do not emit comments to output.

rootDir.description: When down-level compiling, specifies the root directory of input files. Use to control the output directory structure with --outDir.

isolatedModules.description: When down-level compiling, unconditionally emit imports for unresolved files.

sourceMap.description: When down-level compiling, generates corresponding '.map' file.

sourceRoot.description: When down-level compiling, specifies the location where debugger should locate JavaScript files instead of source locations.

stripInternal.description: When down-level compiling, do not emit declarations for code that has an '@internal' annotation.

target.description: Specifies which default library (lib.d.ts) to use. When down-level compiling, specifies the code being generated. Permitted values are 'es3', 'es5', 'es2015', 'es2016', 'es2017' or 'esnext'.

watch.description: When down-level compiling, watch input files.

experimentalDecorators.description: Enables experimental support for ES7 decorators.

emitDecoratorMetadata.description: When down-level compiling, emit design-type metadata for decorated declarations in source.

allowUnusedLabels.description: Do not report errors on unused labels.

noFallthroughCasesInSwitch.description: Report errors for fallthrough cases in switch statement.

allowUnreachableCode.description: Do not report errors on unreachable code.

forceConsistentCasingInFileNames.description: Disallow inconsistently-cased references to the same file.

baseUrl.description: Base directory to resolve non-relative module names.

paths.description: Specify path mapping to be computed relative to baseUrl option.

rootDirs.description: Specify list of root directory to be used when resolving modules.

allowSyntheticDefaultImports.description: Allow default imports from modules with no default export. This does not affect code emit, just typechecking.

noImplicitUseStrict.description: When down-level compiling, do not emit 'use strict' directives in module output.

listEmittedFiles.description: When down-level compiling, enable to list all emitted files. Requires TypeScript version 2.0 or later.

disableSizeLimit.description: Disable size limit for JavaScript project. Requires TypeScript version 2.0 or later.

lib.description: Specify library file to be included in the compilation. Requires TypeScript version 2.0 or later.

maxNodeModuleJsDepth.description: The maximum dependency depth to search under node_modules and load JavaScript files.

typeAcquisition.description: Auto type (.d.ts) acquisition options for this project. Requires TypeScript version 2.1 or later.

include.description: Specifies a list of type declarations to be included in auto type acquisition. Ex. ["jquery", "lodash"]

exclude.description: Specifies a list of type declarations to be excluded from auto type acquisition. Ex. ["jquery", "lodash"]
